awakenings.effect: Each time normal attack deals damage, increases defense by 5%, lasting 10 seconds, stacking up to 30%.
Casting enhanced ultimate skill also has recovery effect, recovery amount equal to the ultimate skill.
[Basic Attack], [Skill], [Ultimate Skill], and [Passive] levels and level cap +2.
[Basic Attack], [Skill], [Ultimate Skill], and [Passive] levels and level cap +2.
All resistance increased by 10%, wind resistance additionally increased by 10%. All damage dealt penetrates 10% wind resistance.

effects: When HP is above 50%, after the wearer attacks, recover 2% max HP
When HP is above 50%, damage taken reduced by 10%, damage dealt increased by 40%
memoryCard.name: Wrong Appearance Timing

auto.description: Grants self a shield equal to 120% of defense.
auto.name: Wind Gang Wall

normal.description: Deals wind damage equal to 120% of defense to designated enemy single unit.
normal.name: Gang Wind Strike

passive.description: Before entering battle, every 1000 defense can increase max HP cap by 4000, max increase 20000 HP cap. When Shielded by the skill Wind Gang Wall, damage taken reduced by 24%, damage dealt increased by 48%.
passive.name: Wind Wisdom

ultimate.description: When HP is below 50%, deals wind damage equal to 120% of defense to the front square target and recovers health equal to 120% of own defense. When HP is above 50%, can enhance the skill to deal wind damage equal to 120% of defense to all targets in a 3Ã—3 area around the front square target, and deals wind damage equal to 240% of defense.
ultimate.name: Wind Blessing

teamSkill.description: Own defense increased by 15%. At the start of battle, every 500 defense can reduce damage taken by 1.5%, stacking up to 6 times.
teamSkill.name: Wind Chemic Alliance

requirements.alternativeConditions: Team contains 2 Chemic characters or 2 Wind characters
